verbs.description: The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers [V: had] not heard from President Donald Trump as of Thursday about upgrading the Soo Locks
[ARG0: The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers] had [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: heard] [ARG2: from President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: as of Thursday] [ARG1: about upgrading the Soo Locks]
